sourcing.instructions: - Co (Cobalt): Supplier of chemical elements or online chemical supply stores.
steps: - Co (Cobalt): Supplier of chemical elements or online chemical supply stores.
1. Measure and weigh all solid ingredients (Co, In, La, Pr) accurately on a precision scale.
preparation.raw_text: 1. Measure and weigh all solid ingredients (Co, In, La, Pr) accurately on a precision scale.

steps: 1. Transfer the mixture to a mold of dimensions 3 inches x 2 inches x 7 inches.
heating.raw_text: 1. Transfer the mixture to a mold of dimensions 3 inches x 2 inches x 7 inches.

steps: 1. After heating, turn off the furnace and allow it to cool gradually to room temperature (about 1-2 hours).
cooling.raw_text: 1. After heating, turn off the furnace and allow it to cool gradually to room temperature (about 1-2 hours).

steps: 1. Once cooled, carefully remove the solid sample from the mold.
post_processing.raw_text: 1. Once cooled, carefully remove the solid sample from the mold.
